description: Sample microchip IDs for testing and demonstration

iso_fdxb_ok.notes: First 3 digits: 001-899 = country code, 900-998 = manufacturer code

avid_10_ok.notes: AVID proprietary format, common in North America

legacy_9_ok.notes: Older format, check multiple registries for coverage

hex_15_ok.notes: Hex format converted to 15-digit decimal ISO for lookups

iso_bad.description: Invalid chip ID formats for testing error handling
iso_bad.notes: These should be rejected by the validator

demo_with_separators.notes: Validator should strip separators and validate the numeric content

usage_notes: These IDs are for testing and demonstration only
Do not use for actual pet registration
